Chamaleon::

Chamaleon was running for all base, he had severals things to do and 
he was checking their duties. He mutered all things that he had done 
while he took notes in a small computer that he had in his hand (The 
computer was small like a notebook). 

"Quaters for Drillbit, Killfest and their troops... done" muttered 
while he walked "Free the new troops... Done; Check cr's... It's the 
next"

Chameleon ran towards cr's
